text:
quick update for anyone watching from the sidelines. <@U243UT96G> and <@U1S5GKTHQ> have been making great progress. we think we’re fairly close to having an (unstyled) working prototype ready, the goal for the day is to either get there, or to evaluate whether we could be there by tuesday. 

next week we’re hoping to get stuff tested fairly thoroughly, so we could use some help from folks in the office testing video uploads from various devices.
Would be happy to help with testing! Great job.
